info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 18 at 8:12PM EDT until July 18 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Morristown TN
info.description:
FFWMRX
The National Weather Service in Morristown has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Russell County in southwestern Virginia... East Central Wise County in southwestern Virginia...
* Until 1015 PM EDT.
* At 812 PM EDT, Major flooding and Evacuations continue in Dante, Virginia. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen.
The following streams are experiencing major flooding: Left Fork Lick Creek, Right Fork Lick Creek, and Lick Creek. Lick Creek flows toward Saint Paul. Flooding along the Lick Creek near Saint Paul is expected. Move to high ground.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Great deal of runoff from the recent heavy rains will continue to produce flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Cleveland Va, Coeburn, St. Paul and Castlewood.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 10:15 PM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 10:15 PM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 10:15 PM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 10:15 PM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
